nodes.bodyText:
What is it that demands so large stack size ?
Is it recursion or large stack allocations ?
We do not use that in production anyway.

AddressSanitizer will instrument stack allocations, presumably to have sentinel zones for catching out of bounds writes. According to https://clang.llvm.org/docs/AddressSanitizer.html "AddressSanitizer uses more stack memory. We have seen up to 3x increase."
